description.value:
Export a PlanDefinition. ### Export Contents The export contains the PlanDefinition including referenced resources:- PlanDefinitions - ActivityDefinitions - Questionnaires - Libraries - Organizations
Each resource is returned in a separate JSon file. ### Parameters - exclude: references to ActivityDefinitions or PlanDefinitions to exclude from the export. ### Output Output can be found in Binary.content. This is a Base64 encoded .zip file containing JSon files. All returned objects are Fhir resources. See the implementation guide for details
